text: ai eemaanadaaron tumhen kya ho gaya hai ki jab tumase kaha jaata hai ki khuda kee raah mein (jihaad ke lie) nikalo to tum ladadhad (dheele) ho kar zameen kee taraph jhuke padate ho kya tum aakhirat ke banisbat duniya kee (chand roza) jindagee ko pasand karate the to (samajh lo ki) duniya kee zindagee ka saazo saamaan (aakhir ke) aish va aaraam ke muqaabale mein bahut hee thoda hai
